00009 class ResolverError(YAMLError):
00010     pass

00012 class BaseResolver(object):
00013 
00014     DEFAULT_SCALAR_TAG = u'tag:yaml.org,2002:str'
00015     DEFAULT_SEQUENCE_TAG = u'tag:yaml.org,2002:seq'
00016     DEFAULT_MAPPING_TAG = u'tag:yaml.org,2002:map'
00017 
00018     yaml_implicit_resolvers = {}
00019     yaml_path_resolvers = {}
00020 
00021     def __init__(self):
00022         self.resolver_exact_paths = []
00023         self.resolver_prefix_paths = []
00024 
00025     def add_implicit_resolver(cls, tag, regexp, first):
00026         if not 'yaml_implicit_resolvers' in cls.__dict__:
00027             cls.yaml_implicit_resolvers = cls.yaml_implicit_resolvers.copy()
00028         if first is None:
00029             first = [None]
00030         for ch in first:
00031             cls.yaml_implicit_resolvers.setdefault(ch, []).append((tag, regexp))
00032     add_implicit_resolver = classmethod(add_implicit_resolver)
00033 
00034     def add_path_resolver(cls, tag, path, kind=None):
00035         # Note: `add_path_resolver` is experimental.  The API could be changed.
00036         # `new_path` is a pattern that is matched against the path from the
00037         # root to the node that is being considered.  `node_path` elements are
00038         # tuples `(node_check, index_check)`.  `node_check` is a node class:
00039         # `ScalarNode`, `SequenceNode`, `MappingNode` or `None`.  `None`
00040         # matches any kind of a node.  `index_check` could be `None`, a boolean
00041         # value, a string value, or a number.  `None` and `False` match against
00042         # any _value_ of sequence and mapping nodes.  `True` matches against
00043         # any _key_ of a mapping node.  A string `index_check` matches against
00044         # a mapping value that corresponds to a scalar key which content is
00045         # equal to the `index_check` value.  An integer `index_check` matches
00046         # against a sequence value with the index equal to `index_check`.
00047         if not 'yaml_path_resolvers' in cls.__dict__:
00048             cls.yaml_path_resolvers = cls.yaml_path_resolvers.copy()
00049         new_path = []
00050         for element in path:
00051             if isinstance(element, (list, tuple)):
00052                 if len(element) == 2:
00053                     node_check, index_check = element
00054                 elif len(element) == 1:
00055                     node_check = element[0]
00056                     index_check = True
00057                 else:
00058                     raise ResolverError("Invalid path element: %s" % element)
00059             else:
00060                 node_check = None
00061                 index_check = element
00062             if node_check is str:
00063                 node_check = ScalarNode
00064             elif node_check is list:
00065                 node_check = SequenceNode
00066             elif node_check is dict:
00067                 node_check = MappingNode
00068             elif node_check not in [ScalarNode, SequenceNode, MappingNode]  \
00069                     and not isinstance(node_check, basestring)  \
00070                     and node_check is not None:
00071                 raise ResolverError("Invalid node checker: %s" % node_check)
00072             if not isinstance(index_check, (basestring, int))   \
00073                     and index_check is not None:
00074                 raise ResolverError("Invalid index checker: %s" % index_check)
00075             new_path.append((node_check, index_check))
00076         if kind is str:
00077             kind = ScalarNode
00078         elif kind is list:
00079             kind = SequenceNode
00080         elif kind is dict:
00081             kind = MappingNode
00082         elif kind not in [ScalarNode, SequenceNode, MappingNode]    \
00083                 and kind is not None:
00084             raise ResolverError("Invalid node kind: %s" % kind)
00085         cls.yaml_path_resolvers[tuple(new_path), kind] = tag
00086     add_path_resolver = classmethod(add_path_resolver)
00087 
00088     def descend_resolver(self, current_node, current_index):
00089         if not self.yaml_path_resolvers:
00090             return
00091         exact_paths = {}
00092         prefix_paths = []
00093         if current_node:
00094             depth = len(self.resolver_prefix_paths)
00095             for path, kind in self.resolver_prefix_paths[-1]:
00096                 if self.check_resolver_prefix(depth, path, kind,
00097                         current_node, current_index):
00098                     if len(path) > depth:
00099                         prefix_paths.append((path, kind))
00100                     else:
00101                         exact_paths[kind] = self.yaml_path_resolvers[path, kind]
00102         else:
00103             for path, kind in self.yaml_path_resolvers:
00104                 if not path:
00105                     exact_paths[kind] = self.yaml_path_resolvers[path, kind]
00106                 else:
00107                     prefix_paths.append((path, kind))
00108         self.resolver_exact_paths.append(exact_paths)
00109         self.resolver_prefix_paths.append(prefix_paths)
00110 
00111     def ascend_resolver(self):
00112         if not self.yaml_path_resolvers:
00113             return
00114         self.resolver_exact_paths.pop()
00115         self.resolver_prefix_paths.pop()
00116 
00117     def check_resolver_prefix(self, depth, path, kind,
00118             current_node, current_index):
00119         node_check, index_check = path[depth-1]
00120         if isinstance(node_check, basestring):
00121             if current_node.tag != node_check:
00122                 return
00123         elif node_check is not None:
00124             if not isinstance(current_node, node_check):
00125                 return
00126         if index_check is True and current_index is not None:
00127             return
00128         if (index_check is False or index_check is None)    \
00129                 and current_index is None:
00130             return
00131         if isinstance(index_check, basestring):
00132             if not (isinstance(current_index, ScalarNode)
00133                     and index_check == current_index.value):
00134                 return
00135         elif isinstance(index_check, int) and not isinstance(index_check, bool):
00136             if index_check != current_index:
00137                 return
00138         return True
00139 
00140     def resolve(self, kind, value, implicit):
00141         if kind is ScalarNode and implicit[0]:
00142             if value == u'':
00143                 resolvers = self.yaml_implicit_resolvers.get(u'', [])
00144             else:
00145                 resolvers = self.yaml_implicit_resolvers.get(value[0], [])
00146             resolvers += self.yaml_implicit_resolvers.get(None, [])
00147             for tag, regexp in resolvers:
00148                 if regexp.match(value):
00149                     return tag
00150             implicit = implicit[1]
00151         if self.yaml_path_resolvers:
00152             exact_paths = self.resolver_exact_paths[-1]
00153             if kind in exact_paths:
00154                 return exact_paths[kind]
00155             if None in exact_paths:
00156                 return exact_paths[None]
00157         if kind is ScalarNode:
00158             return self.DEFAULT_SCALAR_TAG
00159         elif kind is SequenceNode:
00160             return self.DEFAULT_SEQUENCE_TAG
00161         elif kind is MappingNode:
00162             return self.DEFAULT_MAPPING_TAG
00163 
00164 class Resolver(BaseResolver):
00165     pass

00167 Resolver.add_implicit_resolver(
00168         u'tag:yaml.org,2002:bool',
00169         re.compile(ur'''^(?:yes|Yes|YES|no|No|NO
00170                     |true|True|TRUE|false|False|FALSE
00171                     |on|On|ON|off|Off|OFF)$''', re.X),
00172         list(u'yYnNtTfFoO'))
00173 
00174 Resolver.add_implicit_resolver(
00175         u'tag:yaml.org,2002:float',
00176         re.compile(ur'''^(?:[-+]?(?:[0-9][0-9_]*)?\.[0-9_]*(?:[eE][-+][0-9]+)?
00177                     |[-+]?[0-9][0-9_]*(?::[0-5]?[0-9])+\.[0-9_]*
00178                     |[-+]?\.(?:inf|Inf|INF)
00179                     |\.(?:nan|NaN|NAN))$''', re.X),
00180         list(u'-+0123456789.'))
00181 
00182 Resolver.add_implicit_resolver(
00183         u'tag:yaml.org,2002:int',
00184         re.compile(ur'''^(?:[-+]?0b[0-1_]+
00185                     |[-+]?0[0-7_]+
00186                     |[-+]?(?:0|[1-9][0-9_]*)
00187                     |[-+]?0x[0-9a-fA-F_]+
00188                     |[-+]?[1-9][0-9_]*(?::[0-5]?[0-9])+)$''', re.X),
00189         list(u'-+0123456789'))

00191 Resolver.add_implicit_resolver(
00192         u'tag:yaml.org,2002:merge',
00193         re.compile(ur'^(?:<<)$'),
00194         ['<'])
00195 
00196 Resolver.add_implicit_resolver(
00197         u'tag:yaml.org,2002:null',
00198         re.compile(ur'''^(?: ~
00199                     |null|Null|NULL
00200                     | )$''', re.X),
00201         [u'~', u'n', u'N', u''])
00202 
00203 Resolver.add_implicit_resolver(
00204         u'tag:yaml.org,2002:timestamp',
00205         re.compile(ur'''^(?:[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-9][0-9]-[0-9][0-9]
00206                     |[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9] -[0-9][0-9]? -[0-9][0-9]?
00207                      (?:[Tt]|[ \t]+)[0-9][0-9]?
00208                      :[0-9][0-9] :[0-9][0-9] (?:\.[0-9]*)?
00209                      (?:[ \t]*(?:Z|[-+][0-9][0-9]?(?::[0-9][0-9])?))?)$''', re.X),
00210         list(u'0123456789'))

00212 Resolver.add_implicit_resolver(
00213         u'tag:yaml.org,2002:value',
00214         re.compile(ur'^(?:=)$'),
00215         ['='])

00217 # The following resolver is only for documentation purposes. It cannot work
00218 # because plain scalars cannot start with '!', '&', or '*'.
00219 Resolver.add_implicit_resolver(
00220         u'tag:yaml.org,2002:yaml',
00221         re.compile(ur'^(?:!|&|\*)$'),
00222         list(u'!&*'))
